source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
67 113 100 <70
India’s maternal mortality ratio reduced 54 points from 167 deaths per 100,000 live births (SRS’ 2011-2013) to 
113 deaths (SRS’ 2016-18). The SDG goal is to have the global MMR at <70 per 100000 live births while the 
NHP target is to reduce the Maternal Mortality Ratio to 100 by the year 2020.
 As per SRS 2016-2018, 5 states have achieved the SDG target while 11 states have already achieved the NHP 
2017 targets. The names of these states are given in the table below.
States ach
